name: Super Monster Truck Racing: Destruction Stunt Game
name_original: Super Monster Truck Racing: Destruction Stunt Game
description:
Sit back, fasten your seatbelt, start the roaring engine and get ready to drive your way to glory with power packed Monster Trucks. The game provides you with the perfect opportunity to choose between a range of powerful monster trucks and to perform adrenaline rushing stunts. Now you have a chance to push the limits of your monster truck to the maximum on carefully and realistically designed tracks.
Drift, drive, or smash… the option now lies with you and the way you wish to control the steering and hit the gas pedal. So the question is, are you ready? Are you game enough to tame these Monsters under your hand and steer them the way you please?
Make your opponents eat dirt and make your way to victory. Download now!

Key Features:
- Addictive Monster Truck racing missions 
- 5 Different Monster trucks to choose from
- Realistic precision driving 
- Off-roading driving experience
- Alluring background music & 3D environment gaming experience
